Super sturdy material. Might take a little while to break in the straps since they come pretty stiff. Spacious enough for my daily needs. Definitely a good buy!

I have purchased this four times and love it everytime I use it so much I break them from over use .. they with stand my crazy hectic lifestyle longer than most bags! I will purchase it again in a heartbeat. The bat gets so much attention!!!

The zipper pull tab for the main pocket broke when I was trying to unwrap it from the packing tape and tissue paper it had been secured in. The tape was so tight that even trying to get a pair of thread scissors into it is what broke it. Definitely replace the zippers with your own hardware as soon as you can, or pray that they don't wrap it too tight like they did with mine. Otherwise the material of the bag itself is fine.
Absolutely love this bag. So cute and I don’t see anything like it around so it’s unique around here. Love it has room to put some of my kids things inside too. Love it!

This bag was a gift and I really liked this bag, got lots of compliments on it. Had it for almost a year and well, I have to say that although the material is really sturdy and has kept its beauty...what was its downfall was the zipper. I advise that you do your best NOT to stuff it with heavier things such as coin purses, make-up bags, sunscreen, keys, and such all at once. I mean, you MIGHT be able to get away with putting heavier things in this bag but the one I had made the zipper give out and now it doesn't stay zipped anymore even if I only put lighter things in it. Maybe I got the gnarly one, idk, but I would caution to pack light if you want it to last.
Just as picture. I've had it for 2+ years and its still holding up well
My sister loves her new purse! It's good quality and hasn't worn out yet.

Absolutely love this little backpack. Perfect size, good quality.

评论概述: Goth ladies, this is the must have
评论详情: For this price, really well made, detailed, cutest bat-themed mini backpack. Material feels sturdy and durable, it looks like it will last a long time. Bat design is really nice & has spooky  cuteness. Recommend strongly !
I love this purse. The bat is adorable and not too over the top for my taste. It has plenty of pockets and more room than you'd think.

评论概述: GET THIS BATPACK, you WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED.
评论详情: I have purchased now two of these bags and the only reason I had to buy another one was because of my own mistake. I was out at the bar and had been drinking (a lot) and while I was trying to zip it closed the zipper got stuck on my lanyard and I didn't notice so I kept just pulling and slamming it closed (lol). I ended up breaking the zipper and ripping out the teeth. I was devastated. :(  I had been using it for over 2 years every single day and would still be using it as it is still in perfect condition otherwise. As you can see from the picture, I leave my keys/lanyard hanging out and it was 100% my fault it broke but I am more than happy to buy another.  I don't ever leave reviews but this is my favorite backpack/purse I've ever had!! ♥

评论概述: You Get What You Pay For
评论详情: I've bought this exact back twice and I know a coworker who owns the same bag. All three bags have had zipper issues. If you zip the bag slightly too fast the zipper will come off it's track and you'll never get it back on. I've tried every technique trying to zip up the bag in a way that won't cause the zipper to fail, and nothing has worked for more than a couple days. Even when I manage to get it zipped up properly, it'll just come undone with the slightest jarring. You MUST be extremely gentle handling this bag and it's zipper or else you'll end up with the same issue as me and my aforementioned coworker. Very cute design, faux leather holds up great, and I love the extra pockets + size of the bag. It's a shame that the zipper is poorly made/sewn in.

评论概述: Cute, but the zipper just broke?
评论详情: I’ve had it for less than 3 months and the zipper just gave up on life, I haven’t been able to get it to stay closed. I didn’t expect the bag to be super durable because of the price, but really? The zipper? Just stops working out of nowhere? Getting pickpocketed isn’t worth how cute the bag is.

Really cute bag, has plenty of pockets to hide stuff in. The bat on the front is a clasp for the pocket. The leather is really nice and thick. This bag is to be honest a nessary for any gothic persons needs. ♡

Very cute and definitely a well-made, durable, fashionable bag, but it doesn't fit much inside. Needed it for work but it's too small. It's hard to dig into the bottom of the bag, the opening is narrow when you unzip it, causing you to pull everything out to get to anything underneath. If I needed it for a show or event to fit a couple things in it, it'd be ideal, but not for everyday use. You can't even fit a water bottle in the side pockets.
This Bat Back Pack is now my favorite little purse.  I get so many compliments on it. The bat wings on the front of the purse are so adorable.  Highly recommend this purse

I needed a new mini backpack and all the name brands on here had bad reviews plus expensive. Then the Amazon brand one I had saved is not available I'm black anymore sadly.  Then I stumbled upon this. I personally like the gold studs on it. Not all goths hate other colors of metal. It looks more expensive than it is.  So far after a month of heavy use its in great shape. Only one mark from when I accidently put my heavy metal makeup kit on a strap. But even that isn't noticeable.  It has a hidden pocket on the back so I put my cards and cash in that instead of my reciculously huge coach wallet that uses half the space haha.  I do not recommend filling this full though as this style of bag will wear out faster if you do. I keep the bare minimum in it, which for me is more than most haha. Face powder, lipsticks 4x, lip balm, a bottle of pills, mints, a crystal to be safe lol, and eyelash glue and tweezers.  You should give it a try. For the price you really can't beat it. Plus bats!!!! I try to never wear less than 2-3 Bats at a time  Its been 4 months since I bought this and with daily wear its in perfect condition!! It's very strong and durable. The straps are adjustable and awesome.
Really cute. I love it. Perfect size and great quality.
It’s a cute little backpack for going out and I always get complimented on it

I get so many compliments on this bag! It’s very good quality, and sturdy and spacious. I can fit a large wallet and glasses case in here comfortably with plenty of room to spare.  I love the front snap section for extra storage for things I want to grab quickly. Also bonus that this holds up really well in the rain.

评论概述: Perfect for All Your Spooky Purse Needs
评论详情: Loving this purse! It's classy with just enough of a goth whimsy touch to still be business appropriate. The size is good for my needs, and everything works well on it. It's a little more work to have to unzip the larger part every time you need your wallet or whatever, but I feel it's more secure.
This bag quality is wayyyy nicer than I expected coming from Amazon. It’s a thick material that won’t wear and tear easily. I get compliments on it all the time. Love it!

i've had this bag now for nearly a year, and have been using it daily. it's very sturdy, i was surprised by the quality of the fabric when i got it. i've caught the wings on things many times, but they're still very firmly sewn on and in near perfect condition. i can fit quite a bit in there, including my 5.5"x8.5" sketchbook and rolled pencil case. or i can put my fairly large insulated cup inside it, which is the original reason i went looking for a backpack style bag in the first place. if i don't have anything else super big in it, i can also store my foldable cane inside, which is really nice! it's small and compact, but still has a good amount of room inside. the straps are sturdy and comfortable, and i've gotten so many compliments on it. i really don't think you'll regret buying it, i haven't for a single second.
Well made and very cute. I get compliments all of the time on it.

The bag is over all great; the 'fabric' is really stiff & waterproof & it looks just like the pictures. The zipper is really frustrating, however. It's very rare that I can zip it up & not have it split apart or get stuck. I use this bag as my "purse", so I unfortunately have to mess with this zipper multiple times a day. Unzipping it is also never smooth, it snags on itself & gets stuck all the time. Yeah, I could get another mini backpack to use instead, but this is the nicest 1 with bat wings I've found. 5 stars for looks & durability, 1 star for the zipper being literally the worst zipper on anything I've ever owned.
